Reviews.Title: I love this camera!!!
Reviews.Author: Gerald O'Neil "jerrysgal4ever"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because my previous digital camera was hugs, bulky, and just difficult to use, and I was getting ready to go overseas for a few weeks as part of an international adoption. I wanted something that was compact and took good pics. This pretty red camera has a huge (3") display that fills almost the whole back side of the camera. The one thing I noticed right away is that when you snap a picture, it immediately takes the pic. My old digital camera had a noticeable delay in between pushing the shutter button and when the picture was actually taken, leaving plenty of time to move and blur the picture and plenty of time to miss those precious spontaneous pics. It also takes short videos which came in very handy on my visit trip! The camera is very easy to use, and a whole 10 megapixels which is amazing for the very reasonable price of the camera. I love it!!!

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Correa "Cindy"
Reviews.Content: I really like the look of this camera and it's super easy to use. The joystick pad it nice and easy to use. Overall, I like this camera, but I wouldn't by it again or recommend it to someone else for these reasons:First, I can't stand rechargeable batteries, they never stay charged and when I really need new batteries, I can't just go buy some. But that's very personal, some people have had great experiences with rechargeable.Second, if the batteries are low, the whole thing shuts down. It can't run the battery to the end of it's life, if it gets low, it won't function. So like you'll take a really great shot and the it will shut down and so you'll turn it back on to see the shot and it's not there. Soooo frustrating!! If it had an option to turn off the LCD screen and just use a viewfinder that would probably help, but wait! there's no viewfinder.Third, the printing on the buttons rub off. I really don't even remember which button is play back and which one is menu, I just have to keep pressing buttons until I hit the right one. What ever ink or whatever it is they use is really poor quality.And lastly, don't drop it, take it to the beach, get ANY water near it, or let your kids touch it too much because any little thing will make it not work for a few days, but luckily, it always comes back, when you don't need it.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: NM Farmer
Reviews.Content: The Kodak M1033 is easy to use and has quick flash refresh time but the pictures were grainy and much worse than my 4 mp camera.  I returned it and purchased the Sony DSC-W230.

Reviews.Title: You won't find one better... Trust Me.
Reviews.Author: Nicholas Walsh
Reviews.Content: I have had many digital cameras and this is my latest as I bought it for my daughter. I am so impressed, all of my other cameras are Cannons for a price of around $280 each. The Kodak blows them away... seriously, bigger screen, resolution, color etc.I'm not a dealer but just a consumer who takes maybe a 1,000 photos a year for both work and home... You will not be sorry if you make this purchase.

Reviews.Title: excellent camera kodak easyshare M1033
Reviews.Author: Isolda M. Huaman "Yita"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my 70-year-old old-style mom. She loves it. It is very easy to understand, light to carry and to operate, and the pictures have a superior quality. Very good product.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Content: This is my second camera same make and model, my nephew stepped on my old one and cracked the screen I loved it so much I bought another, this time it was half the price and still well worth it. Great camera and very easy to use

Reviews.Title: This camera has flaws
Reviews.Author: C. Buitrago
Reviews.Content: My camera took grainy pictures at dusk and at night, but now doesn't work at all.  Thought it was the battery, so bought new battery, but still turns on, is blurry, then shuts off.  To late to return now, so I'm off to buy another but not a Kodak.

Reviews.Title: CAMERA IS GREAT EVEN REFURBISHED
Reviews.Author: Randee Goldman
Reviews.Content: As a dog rescuer, I have to  have a dependable camera and this one is very dependable.  Very happy with it!!

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Julie Jernigan
Reviews.Content: We already had this camera, we lost one,and the got the second one wet, really wet at a water park, ugh,  so I was glad to find a used one for sale.  It works Ike a charm.  This is a great little camera.  Small, fits right in your pocket and takes great pictures.

Reviews.Title: Really nice, but has some flaws.
Reviews.Author: Arrowyn
Reviews.Content: I've never owned a digital camera and I'm not a photo-taking kind of person, but I didn't have a camera at all.  So I did my research (I thought) and took the plunge.  This camera is really everything I was looking for (and much more), except for one thing.  The "joy stick" button that you use to go through the menus, review the pictures, and probably a lot more that I don't know about, is less than half the size of my little fingernail, and I don't have big hands.  I had to use my fingernail to move it and, most of the time, it didn't move in the direction I wanted it to (didn't get to the function I wanted) because my fingernail was just a little too much toward another direction.  I hope that makes sense.  I REALLY wouldn't recommend this camera for anyone who has large, or even medium-size, fingers.In addition, while I was setting up my preferences, I noticed that the battery needed to be charged again.  I had fully charged it when I got it.  I don't know how long I was playing with it before I noticed this, and I don't know if this is usual, but I thought I'd mention it.One of the preferences I set up was for the camera to turn itself off after not being used for 3 minutes.  After I was finished playing with it, I pressed the button to manually turn it off, and it wouldn't turn off.  I didn't think about taking the battery out (novice, remember?), so I just left it alone.  It turned itself off after about 4 hours!  From then on, it turned on and off just as it was supposed to.Anyway, except for those things, the camera was great!  The 3" display is terrific.  There's virtually no delay between pressing the button and the picture being taken.  The pictures are good, but I'm really no judge.  Upon reading the instruction manual, I found that the camera had many, many more features than I ever anticipated needing, but it's nice to know that they're there.I guess it's back to doing more research.

Reviews.Title: major flaw
Reviews.Author: Xanmom
Reviews.Content: bought in 9/08, since 1/09 when i turn camera on, the start up noise is on, screen is very blurry then it turns off by itself right away. i thought battery had to be replaced, did that, charged it up, still the same. googled the condition, found lots of people have same problem.  gotta make time in the next few days to be on the phone to india to get a replacement phone from them.  good luck huh?i'm really mad.  should have gotten the exorbitant insurance policy from best buy. will  never ever buy kodak again.

Reviews.Title: DOESNT SHOW BATTERY USAGE--OTHERWISE OK!
Reviews.Author: Gerald J. Hamilton
Reviews.Content: WE CANT FIND WHERE THE CAMERA SHOWS ITS BATTERY USAGE AS SHOWN IN THE DIRECTIONS. WE LOVE THE CAMERA BECAUSE IT IS SMALL AND HAS THE ALL THE OPTIONS. THANKS!

Reviews.Title: Perfect camera for my needs
Reviews.Author: Mom on the go "Mom"
Reviews.Content: My last camera was a Kodak and it was 8 years old. This new camera is just what I needed to carry in my purse. I hope it is as reliable as my last one. Love the red!

Reviews.Title: Easyshare software accompanying Kodak camera
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Chalfont
Reviews.Content: I purchased a Kodak EasyShare camera, M1033 10MP red digital camera through Amazon.  Upon receipt of the camera, I followed Kodak's directions and first downloaded the included software into my computer.  This caused my computer to crash and cost me $190 for the services of a computer technician to get my computer back up and running.  The technician stated that the Kodak software frequently adversely affects the operation of computers because it, simply, is inferior.  Ironically, I am very pleased with the performance of the camera itself but the software has convinced me that I will buy no more Kodak products.

ProductInfo.Features:
10.0-megapixel resolution for stunning prints up to 30 x 40 inches
3x optical zoom lens, 5x digital zoom; HD still capture and HD video
3.0-inch indoor/outdoor color LCD; in-camera charging using the included Li-Ion rechargeable battery
Innovative Smart Capture feature automatically adjusts settings for a great picture in just about any environment
Compatible with SD/SDHC memory cards (not included)
ProductInfo.Name: Kodak Easyshare M1033 10 MP Digital Camera with 3xOptical Zoom (Red)
